text:
You cannot add custom fonts to the rich text editor, that I am aware of.

In the code you can add a custom font, there are lots of tutorials online such as <https://www.litmus.com/blog/the-ultimate-guide-to-web-fonts/|https://www.litmus.com/blog/the-ultimate-guide-to-web-fonts/>

You’d need to have your own system create the URLs and store them on the contact records. HubSpot cannot create the unique URLs for you.

Alternatively, this sounds like a double opt in which HubSpot does have: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/email/set-up-double-opt-in-for-emails|https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/email/set-up-double-opt-in-for-emails>
Can you please help me to add custom font in this page template
I’ve provided a resource so you can learn how, or you can hire a freelancer or agency to do it for you.
yes, I know, I have experience of how to do, but need to find out the exact template for the page
